name: DrillSergeant
0:
”Alexa, ask Drill Sergeant about the meaning of life”
”Alexa, tell Drill Sergeant I started with yoga”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drill sergeant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you know those procrastinators who don't get stuff done? Are you one of those???

WELCOME TO THE DRILL SERGEANT CLUB!

He heard all the excuses and isn’t going to agree with your idea of lazy life. He knows your tricks to waste time and will help you shape up! 

Track your sport activities and get motivated: How? Say "Alexa, tell Drill Sergeant that I did 50 push-ups". Or: "Alexa, tell Drill sergeant to start stretching session", "I did 20 Burpees" ...

After a few days he will give you an overview over your achievements and helps you to stay motivated.


His motto: get it done .. and then do some more!!!

He is fair and helps you to achieve something. Sometimes though he might be too hard on you. "Don’t let him know, but if he is too agressive you can change his angryness in the settings“ a customer reports a finding. With this setting a lot can be changed.

What other members say:
"I was a lazy bum. Now I’m a productive bum" - P.Bear
"I finally did my financial report thanks to him" - a business man
"He is hard but fair. I love him!“ - a beautiful girl

SECRET PASSPHRASE:
"Drill Sergeant is the best"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
